    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_80591</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The giant structure of graphite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die riesige Struktur des Graphits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure géante du graphite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura gigante da grafita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura gigante della grafite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γιγαντιαία δομή του γραφίτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura gigante del grafito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the giant structure of graphite where strong covalent bonds exist within layers and weak bonds between layers.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">giant structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">graphite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">layers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die riesige Struktur des 
Graphits, in dem starke kovalente Bindungen innerhalb der Schichten 
und der schwachen Bindungen zwischen Schichten existieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure géante du
graphite où les obligations covalentes fortes existent dans des 
couches et des obligations faibles entre les couches.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura gigante da 
grafita onde as ligações covalent fortes existem dentro das camadas 
e das ligações fracas entre camadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura gigante 
della grafite in cui i legami covalenti forti esistono all'interno 
degli strati e dei legami deboli fra gli strati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γιγαντιαία δομή του 
γραφίτη όπου οι ισχυροί ομοιοπολικοί δεσμοί υπάρχουν μέσα στα 
στρώματα και τους αδύνατους δεσμούς μεταξύ των στρωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura gigante 
del grafito donde los enlaces covalentes fuertes existen dentro de 
capas y de enlaces débiles entre las capas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
